title: The Godfather
overview: Spanning the years 1945 to 1955, a chronicle of the fictional Italian-American Corleone crime family. Vito Corleone, the patriarch, survives an assassination attempt, pushing his youngest son Michael to step into the world of organized crime and revenge.

title: Inception
overview: A skilled thief steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology. He is given the inverse task of planting an idea into a CEO's mind, but his tragic past threatens to doom the mission.

title: Coco
overview: Miguel, an aspiring musician, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer, and lift his family's generational ban on music.

title: The Dark Knight
overview: Batman raises the stakes in his war on crime with the help of Lt. Jim Gordon and District Attorney Harvey Dent. But they soon find themselves prey to a reign of chaos unleashed by the Joker.

title: Am√©lie
overview: A naive girl in Paris decides to help those around her and, along the way, discovers her own capacity for love and connection in a whimsical, color-saturated world.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
overview: Framed for murder, Andy Dufresne is sent to Shawshank Prison. Over decades, he bonds with fellow inmate Red and maintains hope through his quiet perseverance.

title: Up
overview: 78-year-old Carl Fredricksen travels to Paradise Falls in his house equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young Wilderness Explorer with him on a journey of healing.

title: Spirited Away
overview: A young girl is trapped in a magical world of spirits. After her parents are transformed into pigs, she must find the courage to save them and escape.

title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
overview: Joel and Clementine undergo a procedure to erase each other from their memories after a painful breakup, but Joel realizes mid-process that he doesn't want to forget.

title: Pulp Fiction
overview: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

title: Parasite
overview: A poor family schemes to become employed by a wealthy family by infiltrating their household and posing as unrelated, highly qualified individuals.

title: Interstellar
overview: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival as Earth faces a terminal environmental collapse.

title: Toy Story
overview: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure renders him second-best in a boy's playroom.

title: Schindler's List
overview: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

title: The Matrix
overview: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: Lion King
overview: A young lion prince is cast out of his pride by his cruel uncle, who claims he killed his father. After years in exile, he returns to take back his throne.

title: The Truman Show
overview: An insurance salesman discovers his whole life is actually a reality TV show, and he must decide whether to stay in the safety of the dome or head into the real world.

title: La La Land
overview: While navigating their careers in Los Angeles, a pianist and an actress fall in love while attempting to reconcile their aspirations for the future.

title: Whiplash
overview: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.

title: Jumping into the Unknown
overview: A documentary exploration of extreme BASE jumpers who find peace in the most dangerous environments on earth.

title: The Green Mile
overview: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

title: Soul
overview: A New York city jazz pianist suddenly finds himself trapped in a strange land between Earth and the afterlife.

title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
overview: An aging Chinese immigrant is swept up in an insane adventure, where she alone can save the world by exploring other universes connecting with the lives she could have led.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
overview: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer.

title: Blade Runner 2049
overview: Young Blade Runner K's discovery of a long-buried secret leads him to track down former Blade Runner Rick Deckard, who's been missing for thirty years.

title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
overview: A writer encounters the owner of an aging high-class hotel, who tells him of his early years serving as a lobby boy in the hotel's glorious years under an exceptional concierge.

title: Wall-E
overview: In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.

title: Inglourious Basterds
overview: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

title: Arrival
overview: A linguist works with the military to communicate with alien lifeforms after twelve mysterious spacecraft appear around the world.

title: The Prestige
overview: After a tragic accident, two stage magicians in 1890s London engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion while sacrificing everything they have to outwit each other.

title: Inside Out
overview: After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions - Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness - conflict on how best to navigate a new city.

title: The Revenant
overview: A frontiersman on a fur trading expedition in the 1820s fights for survival after being mauled by a bear and left for dead by members of his own hunting team.

title: Mad Max: Fury Road
overview: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search for her homeland with the aid of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshiper, and a drifter named Max.

title: The Social Network
overview: As Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, he is sued by the twins who claimed he stole their idea, and by the co-founder who was later squeezed out of the business.

title: Gladiator
overview: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

title: Cinema Paradiso
overview: A filmmaker recalls his childhood when falling in love with the pictures at the village movie theater and forms a deep friendship with the theater's projectionist.

title: The Big Lebowski
overview: Jeff 'The Dude' Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire of the same name, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it, getting enmeshed in a convoluted kidnapping plot.

title: Heat
overview: A group of high-end professional gamblers, led by Neil McCauley, start to feel the heat from the LAPD when they make a mistake during a heist.

title: Blade Runner
overview: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

title: Seven
overview: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
overview: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

title: Fight Club
overview: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

title: Forest Gump
overview: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

title: Saving Private Ryan
overview: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

title: City of God
overview: In the slums of Rio, two kids' paths diverge as one struggles to become a photographer and the other a kingpin.

title: Goodfellas
overview: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito in the Italian-American crime syndicate.

title: The Lion King
overview: A lion prince, Simba, is tricked into thinking he caused his father's death by his treacherous uncle, Scar, and flees into exile. After years of running away from his past, he returns to reclaim his place as the rightful king.

title: Back to the Future
overview: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent thirty years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the eccentric scientist Doc Brown.

title: Alien
overview: The crew of a commercial spacecraft encounter a deadly lifeform after investigating an unknown transmission.

title: Die Hard
overview: NYPD detective John McClane faces international terrorists holding his wife and others hostage in a Los Angeles skyscraper on Christmas Eve.

title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
overview: Archaeologist Indiana Jones races against Nazis to find the Ark of the Covenant, a religious relic of immense power.

title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
overview: Humanity finds a mysterious object buried on the Moon and sets off on a quest with the intelligent computer H.A.L. 9000.

title: Airplane!
overview: A former fighter pilot with a fear of flying must take the controls of an airliner when the crew becomes incapacitated in this slapstick comedy.

title: Psycho
overview: A secretary on the run checks into a remote motel run by a disturbed young man under the thumb of his overbearing mother.

title: RRR
overview: A fictional history of two legendary revolutionaries' journey away from home before they began fighting for their country in the 1920s.

title: Dangal
overview: Former wrestler Mahavir Singh Phogat and his two wrestler daughters struggle towards glory at the Commonwealth Games in the face of societal oppression.

title: Lagaan
overview: The people of a small village in Victorian India stake their future on a game of cricket against their ruthless British rulers.

title: Sacred Games
overview: A link in their pasts leads an honest cop to a fugitive gang boss, whose cryptic warning spurs the officer on a quest to save Mumbai from cataclysm.

title: Mirzapur
overview: A shocking incident at a wedding procession ignites a series of events that entangle the lives of two families in the lawless city of Mirzapur.

title: Panchayat
overview: A comedy-drama, which captures the journey of an engineering graduate Abhishek, who for lack of a better job option joins as secretary of a Panchayat office in a remote village of Uttar Pradesh.

title: Scam 1992: The Harshad Mehta Story
overview: Set in 1980's and 90's Bombay, Scam 1992 follows the life of Harshad Mehta, a stockbroker who took the stock market to dizzying heights and his catastrophic downfall.

title: Delhi Crime
overview: Based on the 2012 Nirbhaya case, Delhi Crime follows the Delhi Police investigation into the finding of the men who perpetrated the crime.

title: The Ghazi Attack
overview: An underwater tale of courage and patriotism, depicting the mysterious sinking of PNS Ghazi during the Indo-Pak war of 1971.

title: Kantara
overview: A choice between evil and the divine, centering on the conflict between humanity and nature in a mystical coastal forest.

title: Uri: The Surgical Strike
overview: Following the roguish terrorist attacks at Uri Army Base camp in Kashmir, India's special forces carry out a covert operation to avenge the killing of their fellow army men.

title: Chaava
overview: An epic historical drama following the life of Chhatrapati Sambhaji Maharaj, the son of Shivaji Maharaj, and his legendary battles.

title: The Family Man
overview: A world-class spy from the National Investigation Agency tries to protect the nation from terrorists while also protecting his family from the impact of his secretive, high-pressure job.

title: M.S. Dhoni: The Untold Story
overview: The untold story of Mahendra Singh Dhoni's journey from ticket collector to trophy collector - the world-cup-winning captain of the Indian Cricket Team.

title: Love Ni Bhavai
overview: A popular RJ on a FM station, who is single by choice, gets entangled in a situation where she has to choose between two completely different men.

title: Chal Man Jeetva Jaiye
overview: A story about a businessman's family that suddenly loses everything, and how they decide to face the failure with their heads held high and morals intact.

title: Chal Jeevi Laiye
overview: A father and son's journey of self-discovery while traveling to the stunning land of Uttarakhand to find the meaning of life.

title: Chhello Divas
overview: A comedy film that revolves around the lives of eight friends during their last year of college, capturing the madness and the nostalgia of student life.

title: Chabutro
overview: A heartwarming tale of a young man living in the US who returns to his roots in Ahmedabad and finds a new purpose and love.
